name: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: Epic tale of Middle-earth
description: The epic high-fantasy novel about the quest to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
title: The boy who lived begins his journey
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series about a young wizard discovering his magical heritage.

name: A Game of Thrones
author: George R.R. Martin
title: Winter is coming
description: The first book in A Song of Ice and Fire series, a tale of political intrigue, power struggles, and dragons.

name: The Name of the Wind
author: Patrick Rothfuss
title: The legend of Kvothe begins
description: The riveting first-person narrative of a young man who becomes a legend in his own time.

name: The Way of Kings
author: Brandon Sanderson
title: Honor is dead, but I'll see what I can do
description: The first book of The Stormlight Archive, an epic fantasy with unique magic systems and complex characters.

name: Mistborn: The Final Empire
author: Brandon Sanderson
title: The revolution begins
description: A heist story set in a world where magic comes from metals and the Dark Lord has already won.
